useragreement-desc: Renders the user agreement after login. This expires after 12 months and the user is prompted again. Based on the [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:UserAgreement UserAgreement] plugin. Based on work by [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/User:Kevin.ji Kevin Ji] and [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/User:Cindy.cicalese Cindy Cicalese].
